item.title: Breakfast at Tsukiji Fish Market
item.description: What is easily the most visited attraction in Tokyo, the Tsukiji Fish market draws a huge number of visitors each day to do two of the following things: 1. Be up ridiculously early to see the famous tuna auctions 2. Queue up for a delicious sushi breakfast Reading recent articles about the tuna auctions, most were suggesting that a 2am arrival is the earliest youâ€™d need to be there as there are a limited number of people allowed at the auctions.
